Uses of Class
acdp.exceptions.ShutdownException

Packages that use ShutdownException
Package
Description
acdp
Contains the core interfaces needed to operate a database.
acdp.design
Contains classes for designing an ACDP database.

  • Uses of ShutdownException in acdp

    Methods in acdp that throw ShutdownException
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Table.compactFL()
    Eliminates the unused memory blocks within the FL file space of this table and truncates the corresponding data file.
    void
    Table.compactVL()
    Eliminates the unused memory blocks within the VL file space of this table and truncates the corresponding data file.
    void
    Database.createRO(Path roDbFilePath, ICipherFactory cipherFactory)
    Creates an RO database from the data stored in this database, which must be a WR database.
    void
    Table.delete(Ref ref)
    Deletes the referenced row from this table.
    Row
    Table.get(Ref ref, Column<?>... columns)
    Returns the referenced row of this table.
    boolean
    Table.TableIterator.hasNext()
    Returns true if and only if the iteration has more rows.
    Ref
    Table.insert(Object... values)
    Inserts the specified values into this table and returns the reference to the newly created row.
    Row
    Table.TableIterator.next()
    Returns the next row of the table.
    ReadZone
    Database.openReadZone()
    Opens a read zone.
    Unit
    Database.openUnit()
    Opens a unit.
    void
    Table.truncate()
    Deletes all rows of this table and truncates the corresponding data files.
    void
    Table.update(Ref ref, ColVal<?>... colVals)
    Updates the values of the specified columns of the referenced row with the specified new values.
    void
    Table.updateAll(ColVal<?>... colVals)
    For each row of this table updates the values stored in the specified columns with the specified new values.
    <T> void
    Table.updateAllChangeValues(Column<T> column, Table.ValueChanger<T> valueChanger)
    For each row of this table updates the value stored in the specified column with a value obtained from the specified value changer.
    <T> void
    Table.updateAllSupplyValues(Column<T> column, Table.ValueSupplier<T> valueSupplier)
    For each row of this table updates the value stored in the specified column with a value obtained from the specified value supplier.
    void
    Database.zip(int level, boolean home, OutputStream out)
    Creates a zip archive containing the files related to this database and writes it to the specified output stream, leaving the output stream open.
